ui-tokens.diff:
style(ui): use theme variables for button colors

- Updated Button component to use CSS variables instead of hardcoded classes
- Added hover states using theme tokens
- Enabled color transitions
theme-vars.diff:
feat(theme): add primary and surface color tokens

- Defined `--color-primary` and `--color-surface` variables
- Added dark mode overrides for theme tokens
search-feature.diff:
feat(search): add command palette modal

- Implemented `Search` component with keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+K)
- Added backdrop blur and responsive layout
- Configured portal rendering for modal overlay
docs-update.diff:
docs(config): clarify minSecondsBetweenCommits option

- Updated configuration documentation to match actual parameter names
fix-ignore.diff:
fix(config): ignore autopilot.log to prevent loops

- Added `.vscode/autopilot.log` to default ignore list
refactor-move.diff:
refactor(utils): move time helpers to dedicated module

- Deleted `src/utils/helpers.js`
- Created `src/utils/time.js` with `sleep` function
breaking-config.diff:
feat(config): rename timeout to connectionTimeout

- Updated default configuration to use `connectionTimeout`

BREAKING CHANGE: The `timeout` option has been renamed to `connectionTimeout`
tests-only.diff:
test(cli): add unknown command validation test

- Added test case for invalid CLI commands
release-scripts.diff:
chore(release): add verification step before publish

- Updated release script to run `npm run verify` before publishing
ci-update.diff:
ci(workflow): enable tests in CI pipeline

- Added `npm test` step to GitHub Actions workflow
